translations.translation: Did He not find you impoverished and enrich you?
Did He not find you poor and enrich you?
And did He not find you in want, and then enriched you?
And did He not find you in need and make you rich?
And found you in need, so made you prosperous?
And He found you poor and made you rich
And find you in want and make you to be free from want?
Did He not find thee needy, and suffice thee?
Did He not find thee destitute and enrich (thee)?
Did He not find you in want, and make you free from want?
And He found thee destitute, so He enriched thee.
Did He not find you needy, and enrich you?
And He found thee in need, and made thee independent.
And He found you poor, and made you rich (selfsufficient with selfcontentment, etc.)?
Did He not find you poor and suffice you?
And found you in need, and enriched you?
And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

[93:8] And did He not find you needy, poor, and enrich you?, [and] made you content with the spoils and other things which He gave you — in a hadīth [it is stated], ‘Wealth comes not from the proliferation of transient [worldly] goods, but wealth comes from the contentedness of the soul’.

And he also said: (Did He not find thee) Muhammad (destitute) poor (and enrich (thee)) with the wealth of Khadijah; and it is also said this means: and made you content with that which He gave you? The Prophet (pbuh) said: "Yes, Gabriel!"

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلاً فَأَغْنَىٰ } معناه فَقيرٌ فأَغنَى

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلاً } فقيراً حسب إمكانك ومقتضيات بشريتك الموروثة لك من نشأة ناسوتك { فَأَغْنَىٰ } [الضحى: 8] أي: أغناك بغنائه بعدما أفناك فيه، وشرَّفك بخلع اللاهوت بعدما أخرجك عن ملابس الناسوت

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ ووجدك عائلاً } فقيراً من حس الدنيا، { فأَغْنَى } فأغناك به عما سواه، وزوّجك خديجة، فقامت بمؤونة العيش، أو بما أفاء عليك من الغنائم، قال صلى الله عليه وسلم:

 " جعل رزقي تحت ظل رمحي "
